title: Sharp cold snap is expected in Kazakhstan
text: [Tengrinews.kz](https://en.tengrinews.kz/) - Meteorologists have issued a forecast for the weather in Kazakhstan on November 2, 3, and 4. [Tengrinews.kz](https://en.tengrinews.kz/) - Meteorologists have issued a forecast for the weather in Kazakhstan on November 2, 3, and 4. Under the influence of atmospheric fronts, unstable weather is expected across most of Kazakhstan over the next three days, with rain and snow in many areas. However, on November 2-3 in the southeast and November 3-4 in the east, the weather will be dry. Fog is expected in the west, northwest, and southern regions, while strong winds and ice are expected in the north and central parts of the country. "By the end of this period, a sharp drop in nighttime temperatures to 0-7 degrees Celsius below zero and daytime temperatures to -2 to +5 degrees Celsius is expected in the west, northwest, and north. In the center and east, nighttime temperatures will rise to 0-8 degrees Celsius above zero, with daytime temperatures reaching 8-13 degrees Celsius. In the south and southeast, nighttime temperatures will range from 3-13 degrees Celsius, with daytime highs from 15-22 degrees Celsius," the report states. Earlier, meteorologists provided an outlook for the[ 2024/2025 winter in Kazakhstan](https://en.tengrinews.kz/environment/what-will-winter-2024-2025-be-like-in-kazakhstan-264538/). November is expected to have alternating warm and cold days, with snow in most parts of the country and rain with snow possible in the south and southwest. Strong winds, possible blizzards, and icy conditions are also anticipated.
